1.content: You wake up in your bed at home, yesterday you were offered to move into a house with some of your friends. You politely turned them down saying that you didn't think it would be ok with your family. It is a windy day and other then that it is normal in all ways. You live on Florida near the beach and although it sounds good your life has been turmoil the past week. Last monday you had gotten your report card which didn't include a grade better then a B-. On Tuesday you had sprained you ankle trying out for football, it had healed last thursday but it hurt when you put more pressure on it then you needed to. Yesterday on Thursday you got detention on Saturday for harassing other students. Now you would have to live through Friday before the weekend. Today you were caught by a teacher looking up pictures on the internet and got Sunday detention. Now your weekend was ruined and you were furious. Once you got home you stormed up to your room and banged your door in frustration. The top latch quickly gave in and the door came down and slammed you in the head. Suddenly everything blacked out, when you began to regain sight you were in your bed. You turned around and jumped out of bed. You checked your clothes, they were the exact same ones you woke up in. You opened your window and the wind was blowing like it was this morning. You turn around and see that the door is still intact. You quickly say to yourself deja-vu while looking around your room. You notice one thing different. On your nightstand is the TV remote, on closer inspection you notice that it wasn't the remote. It had 2 big buttons and several smaller buttons and switches. You pick the one on the left and press it while it was still pointing at your nightstand. A short burst of light took out your eyes for a moment but the nightstand was shrunken to the size of 2 inches. You decide to try the button on the right and it came with another blinding flash but the nightstand was reduced maybe gained a little bit. Your mind quickly comprehended that this was a Shrink/Grow remote. You were thinking of all the possibilitys when you noticed it was 6:45. You had to decide what to do and now.
1.title: Deja-Vu

choices: You drop the remote and it shrinks you.
11.content: You had a 'size changer' as you decided to call it. Why bother going to school? You could have plenty of fun with this. The one thing that got you however is 'what would happen if someone else got the remote.' that would be an issue, for now though you had it close to you so that was good, you'd cross that bridge when you came to it. Although you figured a few good places to hide it when/if you needed to. For now however you enlarge your nightstand back to normal as a test. "Seems to work." You nod as you look it over. "No place for batteries, and no place for anything else, just point and click huh?" You smile. The way you see it you can do two things. One make yourself bigger, two make someone else bigger. Shrinking yourself made no sense at all. Why lose power and make yourself helpless to no end when you can HAVE power and make others do things for you! You thought of yourself but then you also thought of your girlfriend Alice, Or perhaps Sally? She might be happy, then again...would the power go to her head? You sit on your bed for a moment and think about your choices.
11.title: Stay home today

12.content: You decided that you should use this one one of the people that use to make fun of you. If you made them bigger you could obviously embaress them in ways but that might become a "Big" problem. Or you could shrink one of them and keep them as your pet. The more you thought about it the faster you started to move towords the beach. Soon you were there, you were serveying which cool kids had cut school. You saw Katie a cheerleader who mocked you usually and Brad the captain of the Football team. You were thinking which one would be more amusing to try it out on but in the end you picked...
12.title: Surf, Sand and some unusally sized people

121.content:
Author's note: I REALLY HATE being the one to add chapters like this, but it must be done it seems.


While Katie DID mock you quite a lot you didn't know too much about her, sure you could shrink her and keep her as a "Pet" or perhaps even 'dispose' of her if you really felt that way. Or you could make her grow but...that could be a problem. If you shrank her you'd also need to keep the size changer away from her too. What to do?
121.title: Katie But to do what?

choices: "Micheal and I need to fix our friendship I'll go see him!"
"I should try to become better friends with Rinoha!"
"Alice IS my girlfriend after all I'll go visit her!"
13.content: You think about visiting one of your friends, Normally Micheal would be the first choice but he'd been ignoring you a lot, maybe this could be the spark to reignite your friendship? On the other hand you did have that new girl that you met recently, Rinoha, she was a young Japanese girl about 5'4 you two became friends at school and she shared many interests with you. Maybe she would be a better idea, she did say to call or visit anytime after all. Another though was Alice, she was your girlfriend...right? You two had never been on a date but she still calls you her boyfriend maybe she would be the best choice. You ponder for a moment, finally you decide that _____
13.title: Visit one of your friends

choices: She had hit her head on the ceiling
She was reduced to a couple inches
She had just reduced half the house to rubble due to her massive growth
15.content: You think that you were still asleep when you shot your nightstand so you needed some more proof. While thinking this your sister comes in and yells "Wheres the TV remote!". You quickly jumped around and fired the remote at her, the blinding light came again. When you finally opened your eyes you saw that she...
15.title: Does it really work?

153.content: She screamed and ducked behind the house and yelled "What the fuck you twit". She reached in the house and grabbed you out. She noticed the remote and grabbed it right away. "Did you use this on me!". You yelled "Yes! It's a Shrink/Growth ray!". "Well it better work on clothes... go get me a pair of panties and a bra. You quickly obeyed this giantess and ran inside to get some. You returned in record time with the clothes. She threw the ray on them and they grew to her size. Only now she stood up and took full perspective, she looked at the buttons on the remote and asked which one is grow. You told her it's the one on the right as she pushed it on herself she moaned as your twenty foot sister went to 100 feet. She decided that you should get a front seat to what she was about to do. She picks you up and puts you in the wasteband of her panties. Then she decides she should go to...
153.title: And a giantess is born.

info.brief_description: A giantess story where 99% of things are allowed
info.description:
Hey this is my giantess story, keep it by regular standards. Please no one sentence chapters or 1 way choises unless it makes perfect sence to do it that way. Thank you and have fun ^^

Heres a breif list of people around your house and that you know.

You are Dan a 18 year old Senior. Even though you are a senior you are still a "Geek". People insult you all the time, once you get this device it could be time for revenge.

Your mom Molly has been a gental one most of the time however she can get EXTREMELY phisical and horny when provoked. She is about 4 ft 7 in and has allways been teased about her height. Maybe this can be used for revenge?

Your sister Holly has recently lost her virginity in the last month and is doing it every chance she can. You know that if you dig deep she is nice but recently she has been pretty horny so best watch out.

Your cousin Sally has been a giantess fan since she was 19, you and her have allways been close. You would allways play as kids, no telling what game you guys might play if this happens.

Your "girlfriend" Alice. Even though she calls you her boyfriend you have never been on a real date with her. You have never even held hands. It is her mission to bed you once.

Your best friend Michael. A football player turned bodybuilder, recently he has been ignoring you and you feel that your friendship has been broken. He is 2 years older then you and usually ignorint.
